Welcome to FinPie's documentation!
===============================

FinPie is a comprehensive Python library for Brazilian financial data analysis and quantitative research.

   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   modules/data
   modules/datasource
   modules/analytics
   examples
